name: Follow You Down
content: 我要拥抱太阳,抛下一切
It's true  I'd fall for you
这是真的,我迷恋上你了
Wherever you go  whatever you do
无论你去哪,无论你做什么
You know I'll follow you down
无论你到哪里,就算一无所有
Wherever you go  whatever you do
无论你去哪,无论你做什么
You know I'll follow you down
无论你到哪里,就算一无所有
You're lost  worn out  face down
Right here  right now  somehow I
I'll light the way up for you
我要拥抱太阳,抛下一切
It's true  I'd fall for you
这是真的,我迷恋上你了
Wherever you go  whatever you do
无论你去哪,无论你做什么
You know I'll follow you down
无论你到哪里,就算一无所有
